parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Associates metadata (string) with the row determined by the index. Returns Nothing.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ctrl '''ctSetData''' [index, data]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] - The respective control
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - The row index
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> data: [[String]] - The data to set

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctSetData]] [0, "Test"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
</value></part></template></root>
